mention.text: Sulome , born three months after the morning he was kidnapped
Anderson , the chief Middle East correspondent of The Associated Press who was abducted March 16 , 1985
the chief Middle East correspondent of The Associated Press who was abducted March 16 , 1985
Free Terry Anderson , made up of colleagues from all over the United States
a member of the club during a working assignment in Japan 1979-1981
The Foreign Correspondents Club of Japan
a power struggle between Shiite Moslem radicals and moderates
a group loyal to Iran whose name means Islamic Holy War
Iran whose name means Islamic Holy War
the 15 other Western hostages in Lebanon
former Interior Minister Ali Akbar Mohtashemi
the leader of Iran 's revolutionary radicals
Rafsanjani , leader of the comparatively moderate `` pragmatists '' who want to restore relations with the West
leader of the comparatively moderate `` pragmatists '' who want to restore relations with the West
American and French hostages who shared his captivity and were released
